metadata.title: CVE-2021-39519 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libjpeg through 2020021. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the function BlockBitmapRequester::PullQData()located in blockbitmaprequester.cpp It allows an attacker to cause Denialof Service.

criterions.comment: libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
